requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.60 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 750ti or higher with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 3GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 750ti or higher with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 3GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 70 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2200G+ or Intel Core 8100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 or Intel Core 9400f
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX580 8G / GTX 1660ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
